author: Ross Burden
method: Place the oats, all the seeds, salt and chilli flakes into a saucepan over a high heat and 'toast' for five minutes. Shake the pan regularly to ensure even cooking. Add the oil and chopped mint, heat and stir for a further minute. Serve warm in a bowl.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz oats, toasted,  55g/2oz pumpkin seeds,  2 tbsp sesame seeds,  55g/2oz sunflower seeds,  1 tsp salt,  ½ tsp chilli flakes,  1 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp fresh mint leaves, chopped
